name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quick QR Code Generator - Free & No Ads

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simply the quickest way to generate a QR code from your browser's current tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With one click, this extension generates a QR code for your currently active tab making it easy to share URLs via messenger, email, or text message. You can download the QR Code to your computer or simply copy and paste the generated QR Code image.

This tool is also a huge time saver for those who frequently switch between desktop and mobile devices. Whether you're looking to access directions from Google Maps, test the responsiveness of your newly developed website, or join a Zoom meeting on your mobile device, this extension simplifies the process.

Just activate the extension, and with your phone, scan the QR code. No more typing in URLs or texting links to yourself. Just open, scan, and go!

Have an idea for an app or website? Visit us at www.simplysincera.com or email us at hello@simplysincera.com
